name: Crazy Fox Adventure In Time
description:
"Crazy Fox: Adventure in Time" is a 2,5D platformer (2D game placed in 3D world) inspired by classic psx games, with functionally and easy to use map editor, which allows you to create your own levels and share them with other players.

Game features:
- low poly graphics
- 4 addictive gameplay modes
- 2 different ways of character's steering
- interesting achievements
- time of the day
- challenging difficulty level
- level editor with real time sharing
- gamepad support
- rabbits everywhere!!!
